attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Without doubt there are far too many over the top violent DVD'S FILMS, and TV PROGRAMMES. With the upsurge of violence on the streets with far too many shootings and knife crimes, dont you agree that it's about time we Banned these types of programmes reaching and affecting the minds of the youngsters. Also films which include  high explosions (including such tv programmes such as BRAINIACS blowing up caravans) Aren't they affecting the ozone too. I think it's time to put a halt to all this, and make it a better place to live. let's show some family type films with happy endings, and lets cool things down. we've gone too far and enough is enough.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
